thread.title: Re: Watch: Reporter says Obama’s WH would ‘routinely’ keep his organization out of press gaggles
thread.title_full: Re: Watch: Reporter says Obama’s WH would ‘routinely’ keep his organization out of press gaggles

author: NeoKong
title: Re: Watch: Reporter says Obama’s WH would ‘routinely’ keep his organization out of press gaggles

organizations.name: facebook share on twitter  washington times

text:
Watch: Reporter says Obama’s WH would ‘routinely’ keep his organization out of press gaggles Posted at 5:08 pm on February 26, 2017 by Jacob B. Share on Facebook Share on Twitter 
Washington Times reporter Charlie Hurt would like to remind a media in a frenzy over Donald Trump about how Barack Obama dealt with negative press. He recalls being kicked off of Obama’s campaign plane in 2008 over something he wrote and being “routinely” kept out of White House media gaggles. . @CharlesHurt : "A column that I wrote in 2008 got me kicked off of President Obama's campaign plane." pic.twitter.com/YtDrGOrUNE 
— Fox News (@FoxNews) February 26, 2017 Trending
